mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO UNION_ERR_INFO ( err_trans_flag, proxy_ins_code, send_ins_code, trace_num, trans_date, acct_no, trans_amt, msg_type, trans_code, mer_type, rec_card_terminal_code, retrival_no, sev_cdt_code, auth_resp_code, rec_ins_code, send_card_code, org_trace_num, trans_resp_code, sev_input_way, hear_get_fee, hear_pay_fee, scd_plus_fee, customer_fee, get_fee, set_fee, err_reason, rec_insorout_code, transfer_out_card, turn_ins_code, transfer_in_card, org_trans_date, card_seq, ter_load_abity, ic_cdt_code, last_trans_date, last_trans_amt, trans_region, eci_flag, mer_code, send_trans_org, re_trans_org, turn_trans_org, terminal_type, mer_name, spec_charging_type, spec_charging_grade, reserved1, card_info, last_err_trans_code, trans_launch_mode, settle_acct_type, order_ssn, reserved )
(SELECT #{item.errTransFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proxyInsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sendInsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.traceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.merType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recCardTerminalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.retrivalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sevCdtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.authRespCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recInsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.sendCardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgTraceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transRespCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sevInputWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.hearGetFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hearPayFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scdPlusFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.customerFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.getFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.setFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.errReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recInsOrOutCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.transferOutCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.turnInsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transferInCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgTransDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.cardSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terLoadAbity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.icCdtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastTransDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.lastTransAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.eciFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.sendTransOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reTransOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.turnTransOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminalType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.specChargingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.specChargingGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.cardInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastErrTransCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.transLaunchMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.settleAcctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.OrderSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reserved,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL)
